project_abstract.cdata: The Health Development Project will assist the Ministry of Public Health (MOPH) to shift from an urban-based hospital-oriented health system to a more cost-effective system of primary care. The project will include: (a) the strengthening of primary care and basic health services, including family planning, in three provinces; (b) the improvement of MOPH management; (c) the strengthening of training and Information, Education, Communication (IEC) programs; and (d) the improvement of the supply of basic drugs.
